SAVINGS_DEPOSIT_WITHOUT_PENALTY: Savings paid by {{member_name}} for the cycle starting from {{cycle_start_date}} to {{cycle_end_date}}
SAVINGS_DEPOSIT_WITH_PENALTY: Savings paid by {{member_name}} for the cycle starting from {{cycle_start_date}} to {{cycle_end_date}} with penalty of {{penalty_amount}}
LOAN_APPROVAL: Loan taken by {{member_name}} for the amount of {{amount}}
LOAN_PROCESSING_FEE: Processing fee amount {{amount}} paid by {{member_name}} for the loan sanctioned {{loan_id}}
LOAN_INSTALLMENT_WITHOUT_PENALTY: Installment amount {{amount}} paid by {{member_name}}. Loan ID - {{loan_id}} - Installment No - {{installment_number}}
LOAN_INSTALLMENT_WITH_PENALTY: Installment amount {{amount}} paid by {{member_name}}. Loan ID - {{loan_id}} - Installment No - {{installment_number}} with penalty of {{penalty_amount}}
LOAN_PRECLOSE: Loan preclosed by {{member_name}} for the amount of {{amount}}. Approved by {{approved_by}} on {{preclose_date}}
